Module lanat
Package lanat.helpRepresentation.descriptions

Class Tag

java.lang.Object
lanat.helpRepresentation.descriptions.Tag
Direct Known Subclasses:
ColorTag, DefaultValueTag, DescTag, FormatTag, LinkTag
public abstract class Tag extends Object
Class for handling parsing of the simple tags used in descriptions. (e.g. <a-tag=the-value>). Tags may receive no value, in which case the value received by the parse(NamedWithDescription, String) method will be null.
See Also:
  • parse(NamedWithDescription, String)

  • Method Details

    • parse

      @NotNull protected abstract @NotNull String parse(@NotNull @NotNull NamedWithDescription user, @Nullable @Nullable String value)
      This method will parse the tag value and return the parsed value.
      Parameters:
      user - user that is parsing the tag
      value - value of the tag. May be null if the tag has no value specified. (e.g. <a-tag>)
      Returns:
      parsed value of the tag
      See Also:
      • Tag

    • getTagNameFromTagClass

      public static String getTagNameFromTagClass(Class<? extends Tag> tagClass)
      Returns the name of the tag class. This method will return the name of the tag class that is registered with the given name.
      Parameters:
      tagClass - tag class
      Returns:
      name of the tag class

    • register

      public static void register(@NotNull @NotNull String name, @NotNull @NotNull Class<? extends Tag> tag)
      Register a tag class to be used in descriptions. This class will be instantiated to parse the tags encountered in the descriptions being parsed.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the tag (case-insensitive). Must only contain lowercase letters and dashes.
      tag - tag object that will be used to parse the tag

    • unregister

      public static void unregister(@NotNull @NotNull String name)
      Unregister a tag. This method will unregister the tag with the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the tag to unregister
